effect.short: Forces the target to have no evasion, and allows it to be hit by Psychic moves even if it's Dark.
effect.full: Resets the target's evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field.  A dark Pok√©mon under this effect takes normal damage from psychic moves.  This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
